metadata.subject: Trump taps Texan Brad Parscale his 2020 re-election campaign manager

relationships.description: Kahn is sending Epstein a news article about political appointments

analysis.purpose: To share a news article about Brad Parscale's appointment as Trump's 2020 campaign manager
analysis.significance: Shows communication about political developments and appointments within Trump's circle

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present in this email

details: Texas Tribune news article about Brad Parscale's appointment as Trump's 2020 campaign manager

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a Texas Tribune article about Brad Parscale being appointed as Trump's 2020 re-election campaign manager, sharing publicly available political news.
